bacs.title: Direct Bank Transfer
bacs.description: Make your payment directly into our bank account.
bacs.instructions: Please use your Order ID as the payment reference.

cheque.title: Check Payments
cheque.description: Please send a check to our office address.
cheque.instructions: Make checks payable to Summit Outfitters.

stripe.title: Credit Card (Stripe)
stripe.description: Pay securely with your credit card.
